mapper.sql: vspid, name, code, bundleflag, pageflag, reviewflag, touchflag, liftflag, calendarflag, mscreenflag, flowrateflag, streamflag, dvbflag, videoinflag, maxdevices, maxstorage, currentdevices, currentstorage, apps, status, description, createtime, createstaffid
mapper.select:
select
from vsp where status=1 order by vspid desc
select * from vsp where status='1' and name = #{name}
select * from vsp where status='1' and code = #{code}
mapper.update: update vsp v, (select sum(maxdevices) as value, vspid from org where status='1' group by vspid) r set v.currentdevices=r.value where v.vspid=r.vspid and v.status=1
update vsp v, (select sum(maxstorage) as value, vspid from org where status='1' group by vspid) r set v.currentstorage=r.value where v.vspid=r.vspid and v.status=1
mapper.insert:
